page.title: 04Transport South of Oakley 1
page.content:
The recent building of the{M3 Motorway with the local interchange, reduced traffic on the other main highway in the area, the{A30 Trunk Road.}Modern vehicles have difficulty negotiating the narrow{country lanes.}Minor roads and cul de sacs in recently built housing areas are frequently lined with{parked cars.}Popular makes are: Ford, Austin/Rover, Vauxhall, Volvo and Volkswagen.{Bicycles}especially "BMX's", are popular with children. Few adults ride bicycles.
Numbered{footpaths}are becoming increasingly used by ramblers and for leisure activities such as family walks, jogging and dog walking. The latter is the cause of frequent complaint due to the fouling of footpaths.
